name: Metaword 006 // The Power of Words
description:
Indirect OBJKTs work with direct OBJKT

Then there are indirect OBJKTs. An indirect OBJKT is a receiver of a direct OBJKT. 

Utility token based on the rules of English Grammar. To be burnt for access to giveaway and limited drops. 

The Rules of Grammar will have an initial run of 6 NFTs. 

If nothing else, it may help you better your command of the Queen's English. Thank you kind sir. 

If you have collected the entire series, you are able to construct a cohesive sentence with all the right elements. You can then move to the punctuation utility tokens.
